import React from 'react' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' import '../App.css' import { Card } from 'react-bootstrap' const MemoryCard = props => { const memory = props.post return ( {memory.title}

{memory.creator}

{memory.message} ) }

{memory.title}

{memory.creator}

{memory.message}

export default MemoryCard
